arts.sum: Manchester United travel to the City Ground today, aiming for a fourth consecutive Premier League victory. This would represent their best winning streak of the season so far. arts.sum: Manchester United will travel to the City Ground on Saturday, aiming to win their fourth consecutive Premier League match. They face a Nottingham Forest side, however, who are still searching for a first league win under new manager Sean Dyche.
